cardInfo.notes: Designed for astronomy enthusiasts and students seeking to test their knowledge of cutting-edge space science.
cardInfo.title: Space Exploration Quiz
cardInfo.description: An expert-level quiz exploring advanced concepts in astronomy, astrophysics, and space exploration missions.

quizQuestions.question: What is the approximate distance to the nearest star system, Alpha Centauri?
Which phenomenon occurs when a massive star collapses at the end of its life?
What is the primary component of Jupiter's atmosphere?
Which space telescope was specifically designed to observe infrared radiation?
What causes the auroras (Northern and Southern Lights) on Earth?
choices: Solar wind interacting with Earth's magnetosphere
Reflection of sunlight off ice crystals
Volcanic ash in the upper atmosphere
Meteor showers burning in the atmosphere
quizQuestions.correctAnswer: Solar wind interacting with Earth's magnetosphere

quizQuestions.question: Which planet has the most eccentric orbit in our solar system?
What is the theoretical boundary around a black hole called?
Which space mission was the first to successfully land on a comet?
